nodes.text: Rang Thang, also known as Rangthang, was a four-armed DJ who worked for the Hutt Grand Council during the Clone Wars. He was present when Jedi Masters Quinlan Vos and Obi-Wan Kenobi came looking for Ziro the Hutt.
According to concept art found in the episode guide for 'Hunt for Ziro', Rang Thang's species also has four legs, eight limbs total.
